description.title: The title of the segment
description.image: Add a URL for an image
description.imageFocus: Where the focus point should be of an image when container dosen't match image ratio.
description.background: The background color, can be an URL to an image, hex value or a color name (i.e. primary, secondary, etc)
description.height: Height behavior of the sections height
description.paddingTop: If it should have padding in the top
description.paddingBottom: If it should have padding in the bottom
description.textAlignment: How to align the text vertically
description.reverseColumns: If image and text should change order
description.overlay: Add an overlay over an image to make text more legible
description.stretch: Always stretch the section vertically. Makes the section the width of the viewport. Requires a centered container.
description.buttons: Array of buttons according to the @button specification. Do not use more than two buttons, one primary and on secondary.
